doc:
Robert Merrill https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Merrill 0 Robert Merrill (June 4, 1917 – October 23, 2004) was an American operatic baritone and actor, who was also active in the musical theatre circuit. He received the National Medal of Arts in 1993. Robert_Merrill ( June_4_,_1917 – October_23_,_2004 ) was an_American_operatic_baritone_and_actor , who was also active in the_musical_theatre_circuit . He received the_National_Medal of Arts in 1993 .
